notes.text: ValueListProvider: correct description when multiple requests are send
ValueHelpDialog: add in ignoredFields description only if the key column is in ValueList
SmartField: renderWhitespace property is now applied when creating text controls
SmartField: Description is now shown on context changed
SmartFilterBar: DateRange support new options
SmartField: FunctionImport field with wrong value list restriction
ValueListProvider: model value of single filter field is correctly updated when there is validation request
SmartField: Supports lazy loading of function import parameters value help metadata
ValueListProvider: type ahead no longer throws exception
ValueHelpDialog: Add button in header now has correct announcement
SmartField: On items load the ComboBox now applies the already set value on specific case
SmartField now fires change event with opened suggestions
SmartVariantManagementModel: updateView take care of standard variant
We now ensure that for the new tokens created in SmartMultiInput, the correct context is returned
FilterBar: Order of filter items is now correct
SmartField: 0 value for NUMC with TextArrangement is now not shown initially
SmartField: Value is no longer cleared when binding context is changed
FilterBar: changing localization now recreates the buttons with reloaded resource buntle
ValueHelpDialog: add in ignoredFields description, only if the key column is in ValueList entity set and is visible
SmartFilterBar: SFBMultiComboBox now updates the model properly on suggested item selection
ValueListProvider: The correct filter field description is now applied when multiple validation requests are submitted
SmartField: description is now correctly handled in display mode
SmartFilterBar: variant now stores info for condition type filters having default operation
FilterProvider: show all filters button is now correctly set according to the configurations
SmartField: maxLength handling with TextOnly and isDigitalSequence
SmartFilterBar: Unable to remove tokens in adapt filters dialog scenario is now fixed
SmartField: Description is now not fetched when the control is hidden
